item.title: Carmelo La Gamba
item.description: About Me I’m a computer scientist (M.Sc in Computer Science), skilled in cloud-based architectures, enterprise applications and team leading. I study and develop new projects in different computer science fields like IoT and Artificial Intelligence. Currently, I’m Chief of Internal Software Factory in TIM S.p.A, the largest Telco company in Italy. I play guitar and swim Work experiences I have + years of experience on the IT field and I worked with 15+ different teams.

item.title: Carmelo La Gamba
item.description: Work Year Position Company 2021 - * IT Team Leader TIM S.p.A — Role: Lead teams during all phases, requirements analysis management. — Tech stack: DevOps, Google Cloud Platform 2019 - 2021 Technical Team Leader Capgemini Engineering — DevOps: Docker, Jenkins, Heroku, OpenShift, Kubernetes — Tech stack: SpringBoot, Java8+, Jax-RS, Hibernate, Jpa, NodeJS, Angular8+, npm 2016 - 2019 Software Engineer Sintea S.r.l (Previnet S.p.A company) — Stack: Jax-RS, EJB 3.0, Hibernate, Jpa, Wildfly 10, Jenkins, AngularJS, Angular2+, ui-router, @uirouter, bower, npm, yarn, gulp 2015 - 2016 Software Developer Audacia S.
